snippet.title: Railroad Empire gameplay (PC Game, 1988)
snippet.description:
Introduction and gameplay for Railroad Empire, Dos PC game produced by Artdink in 1988 - http://www.squakenet.com/download/railroad-empire/6215/
Trying to figure out how to play in this old strategy game. Trying to set some station and laying a railroad in Italy. Not easy to use interface.
Played through Dosbox emulation platform.
Recorded with original sound.

Similar videos you may like:
Ports of Call - https://youtu.be/q3Ou-_wQw5k
Black Monday - https://youtu.be/8Jk5ptnTx9A
SimCity - https://youtu.be/BGAkMWie1UA
